body:
The thing is I create the zones from breps and I think I need to explode them and define each surface - which I was really looking forward to avoid. 



Just make sure the Breps are modeled correctly. Check all of them to be at the same level and the surfaces are touching.

On this subject - is there a tutorial or a file on how to make an atrium?

I can't remember of any but it is quite similar to creating zones next to each other except that you will have more interior windows.
